version_description:
Sink your teeth into the worldwide release of JAWS.io!
• Added device vibration when hitting/rescuing/eating swimmers or objects and when your boat shots hit JAWS.
• Achievements now grant skins correctly
• Generic bug-fixes and other optimizations

Sink your teeth into the worldwide release of JAWS.io!
• Added device vibration when hitting/rescuing/eating swimmers or objects and when your boat shots hit JAWS.
• Achievements now grant skins correctly
• Generic bug-fixes and other optimizations

• New Skins are available! Unlock the new HoloJAWS shark and Riverboat today!
• Eat your way through an all new location – the Mediterranean!
• Load times have been optimized and reduced!
• Generic bug-fixes and other optimizations

• Check out two brand NEW game modes! The JAWS or Hunter mode allows you to play as the mighty shark or shark hunter boat for the duration of the match…Highest score wins! 
• Watch ads after each match to multiply your shark point earnings and unlock new skins even faster! 
• The general look and feel of the game have been revised for clarity, readability and general ease of use 
• Additional generic bug-fixes and other optimizations

• Eat through an all NEW location, the Sea of Japan!
• New skins are available!  Unlock the Ghost Pirate Ship and Skeleton JAWS today!
• General bug-fixes and other improvements

• New skins are available!  Unlock the Easter Bunny Shark and Swan Boat today!
• General bug-fixes and other improvements

• Introducing power ups!
• Hidden maps to unlock!
• General bug-fixes and other improvements

• Log on every day and collect new Daily Bonuses!
• Conquer the new extra difficult version of the Amity Map!
• General bug fixes and other optimizations

• Log on every day and collect new Daily Bonuses!
• Complete Daily Achievements to unlock rewards!
• Conquer the new extra challenging version of the Mediterranean Map!
• Explore the Sea of Japan map, now in Rampage mode!
• General bug fixes and other optimizations

• Consume the Sea of Japan map, now in Rampage mode!
• Stage progression, coins, and power ups now save so you won’t lose progress if you delete then reinstall the app on the same device
• General bug fixes and other optimizations

• New skins for your Boat and JAWS now available!  Visit the store to unlock the Ghost Ship and Boneshark skins today!
• General bug fixes and optimizations

NOTICE

We hope you have enjoyed playing JAWS.iO. Effective immediately, we are discontinuing support for the game and there will be no further content or functionality updates. On October 31, 2019 the game’s servers will be shut down completely. Game progress and in-game items will not be saved, and user data will be unavailable shortly after such date.

In-app purchases are now disabled (as of October 1, 2019). If you have any in-game currency remaining, remember to spend it before JAWS.iO goes offline and the game is no longer playable on October 31, 2019.

We appreciate the support and enthusiasm we received for JAWS.iO and hope you will check out some of our other games available for download in the app stores!

https://www.nbc.com/general/pages/terms
